content.rendered:
2022 Canadian Grand Prix Hotels & Accommodations

What better way to enjoy one of Canada’s most treasured cities than from the heart of this beautiful destination? Each of Roadtrips’ carefully selected properties for the 2022 Canadian Grand Prix are well-located nearby some of Montreal’s most popular restaurants, attractions and shopping. Whether you choose the Montreal Marriott Chateau Champlain, Fairmont Queen Elizabeth or the luxurious Ritz-Carlton Montreal, each property offers a comfortable place to relax and enjoy during your stay in Montreal.
